name: AtrialAblation
title: Atrial Ablation
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for procedures for atrial ablation.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that describe a procedure for destruction of the right atrium as well as the conduction mechanism using the open and percutaneous approaches.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that describe situations, history of, radiofrequency procedures or ablation of structures other than the right atrium.)
